FuncDef: This command configures the address ranges of the multicast groups for which this router can be an RP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the multicast group IP address expressed in dotted decimal notation. Values-224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255.

The mask associated with the IP prefix expressed as a mask length or in dotted decimal notation; for example /16 for a sixteen-bit mask. The mask can also be entered in dotted decimal notation (255.255.0.0). Values-4 to 32.
Specifies the subnet mask in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).
